      • createUpdaterUploader

        public void createUpdaterUploader(String rootFolder,
                         ARUtilsManager utilsManager,
                         ARSALMd5Manager md5Manager,
                         ARDISCOVERY_PRODUCT_ENUM product,
                         ARUpdaterPlfUploadProgressListener plfUploadProgressListener,
                         Object progressArgs,
                         ARUpdaterPlfUploadCompletionListener plfUploadCompletionListener,
                         Object completionArgs)
                           throws ARUpdaterException
        Creates the ARUpdater Uploader
        Parameters:
        rootFolder - The root folder
        utilsManager - The utils manager initialized with the correct network (wifi or ble)
        product - see ARDISCOVERY_PRODUCT_ENUM
        plfUploadProgressListener - The available progress listener
        progressArgs - The available progress listener arg
        completionArgs - The available completion listener
        progressArgs - The available completion listener arg
        Throws:
        ARUpdaterException - if error

      • dispose

        public ARUPDATER_ERROR_ENUM dispose()
        Deletes the ARUpdater Uploader
        Returns:
        ARUPDATER_OK if success, else an ARUPDATER_ERROR_ENUM error code
